activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10471
activity.text:
Hi @nihal467,
I am especially excited about the Nutrition Rehabilitation Module project! My technical qualifications in ReactJS, NodeJS, TypeScript, and Django make me a prime candidate, and I'm keen on creating instruments that enable doctors and patients to take control of their health. I'd be honored to participate in creating personal plans, measuring progress, and making dynamic revisions to maximize nutrition outcomes.

Counting on exchanging ideas on how I can facilitate making this idea a reality!
